mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_id, mem_nick, mem_pw, mem_email) values(#{mem_id},#{mem_nick},#{mem_pw},#{mem_email})
mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pw=#{mem_pw}
select * from member order by mem_grade
mapper.update: update member set mem_login_cnt = mem_login_cnt+1 where mem_id = #{mem_id}
